detail_desc: Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and a press stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with a metal decoration at the front. Zip at the top, a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton jersey vest tops with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short, collarless jacket in faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and loose top-layer collar that covers the shoulders. Buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication at the top and short sleeves with flounced trims. Flounce at the top and hem and a visible zip at the back.

Set with a hat, pair of mittens and tube scarf in a soft, double-layered fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens (size 0-6M without thumbs) with foldover ribbing at the cuffs.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the back and adjustable shoulder straps with press-stud fastenings. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut blouse in printed woven fabric with a slightly wider neckline and buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Romper suit in soft, organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Seam at the hips with a contrasting colour lower section that has press-studs at the crotch.
Top and leggings with a print motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in different colours of cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.

Long, sleeveless dress with a unique nursing feature, narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam on the skirt for added width. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short jersey skirt with decorative metal studs on the front, an elasticated waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with lace details. Moulded, padded, opening cups, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a modal and cotton blend with a wide neckline and seam at the waist with a drawstring. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Block-patterned windbreaker in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and jersey-lined hood. High collar, a zip at the top with a ring pull, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped jumper in a soft, rib knit with long sleeves and a low neckline at the back with crossover straps.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Soft bra top in lace and mesh with removable inserts and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated hem, a cut-out section at the front and a single back fastener.
Fully lined, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly with a button.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Joggers in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim legs with gathered seams and a visible zip at the hems.
Three-strand necklace with metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.

Calf-length satin dress with slits at the front, an opening down the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the hem. Seam at the waist with decorative gathers, a detachable fabric belt and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Blouse in airy crêpe with a small stand-up collar, gathers at the back of the neck, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.

Dungaree shorts in lightweight washed cotton denim with frill-trimmed straps and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Heart-shaped chest pocket, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Striped shirt in a soft poplin made from a viscose blend in a straight cut with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat, while keeping the jeans in shape. The jeans have a regular waist and skinny legs.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, loop at the back, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
Blouse in an airy plumeti cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a small frill trim around the neckline. Short sleeves with a small frill trim.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and slightly wider, gently tapered legs with creases.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Knee-length, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Short dress in cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Cargo trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap welt back pockets and flap leg pockets.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and wide, straight legs.
Short, flared skirt in a patterned cotton weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim and a gathered seam half way down for added volume at the hem. Unlined.
Double-breasted, fitted jacket in felted fabric with a high stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fishnet knee-highs with elasticated tops.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y). Zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fancy dress cape in a transparent, patterned weave with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the top. Hood with a padded crown on top and a pile trim that continues down the front opening.
Padded ski mittens in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with elastication and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Reflective details and a Thinsulate™ lining. Size 3-6 M without thumbs.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastening around the ankle and a grosgrain loop at the back. Moulded insoles in imitation suede and fluted soles.
